name: The Auxilium Project
description:
The Auxilium Project

Following the launch of the lifeboat escape pod programme, it was determined that most instances of lifeboat deployment occur too far from civilised space for the passengers to survive before a traditional rescue crew would be able to retrieve them. 

To resolve this, the Auxilium Project was set up to work with volunteers who could assist in the instance of an interstellar catastrophe.

As an interstellar pilot, your have three tenets:

- Recover the passengers
- Safeguard the project
- Return from the mission

Stay safe,

TAP Administration 

Controls

Mouse - Look and the ship will follow

WASD - Pitch and Roll overrides

Space - Boost
